episodes.title: Evil Japanese Cults Still Operating Today
episodes.description:
On this video documentary you'll learn about 5 terrifying cults in Japan that are still active today and unfortunately not even the government can shut them down. 
Aleph (formerly Aum Shinrikyo) - The sarin gas attackers
Happy Science - The political cult with nationalist ideology
Unification Church (Moonies) - Connected to Shinzo Abe's assassination
Jehovah's Witnesses - The shunning practices and abuse cover-ups
Jikousan - Rural faith-healing cult with extreme practices

FAIR USE

This video is protected under fair use as it has been altered for educational purposes and includes commentary. The modifications serve to enhance the educational content, providing added value and transforming the original video's audience and intent.
